c74object.name: tap.delay_calc
c74object.description: Calculates the amount of feedback needed to decay over a certain amount of time for any given delay.

attribute.name: delay
attribute.description: In order to calculate the feedback amount for a given decay time, the amount of delay (in ms) must be known.

attribute.name: decay
attribute.description: Specify the decay time (in seconds) that is desired to get the correct scaling for the feedback coefficient.
